Comics

One of my oldest and longest passions has been reading and to a much lesser degree making comics. So far the output has been limited to two single projects that have made their way online.

Coffee Beans

Coffee Beans is a 4 page short graphic story was created as part of the Observer/Comica/ Jonathan Cape ‚ÄòShort Graphic Story‚Äô competition in 2009. Sadly the entry didn‚Äôt win, but I still like the story. This was my first full comic book story I‚Äôve written and drawn.

An all-ages comic strip about Corgan and Alfie who live on the Moon‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääeating cheese & making noise.
